name: Lighthouse Simulator
description:
Give you $100,000 to stay at the lighthouse on this uninhabited island that is often haunted for ten days, would you be willing? You are alone, accompanied by the sunrise and sunset, only the waves, sea breeze and seagulls, there is nothing to do, the only thing you have to do is to endure the isolation and loneliness, this may be a hell suffering, or a life of self-imposed exile.

Features:
Real weather system
Realistic waves and seawater
AI Controlled Seagull Flock

Controls:
Right Mouse: Rotate view
Escape: Menu / Settings
